task: Move Beckhoff to (30,30,30), formula is beckhoffFormula.fml
Ini_1:
1. Disconnect Beckhoff machine
2. Select machine formula file beckhoffFormula.fml
3. Connect Beckhoff machine, address 192.168.1.100, port 851
4. Enable X-axis
5. Enable Y-axis
6. Enable Z-axis
7. Set X-axis speed to 10
8. Set Y-axis speed to 10
9. Set Z-axis speed to 10
10. Move X-axis to 30
11. Move Y-axis to 30
12. Move Z-axis to 30
Ini_2:
1. Select machine formula file beckhoffFormula.fml
2. Connect Beckhoff machine, address 192.168.1.100, port 701
3. Enable X-axis
4. Enable Y-axis
5. Enable Z-axis
6. Set X-axis speed to 10
7. Set Y-axis speed to 10
8. Set Z-axis speed to 10
9. Move X-axis to 30
10. Move Y-axis to 30
11. Move Z-axis to 30
Ini_3:
1. Disconnect Simu machine
2. Select machine formula file beckhoffFormula.fml
3. Connect Beckhoff machine, address 192.168.1.100, port 851
4. Enable X-axis
5. Enable Y-axis
6. Enable Z-axis
7. Set X-axis speed to 10

9. Set Z-axis speed to 10
10. Move X-axis to 30
11. Move Y-axis to 30
12. Move Z-axis to 30
Ini_4:
1. Select machine formula file beckhoffFormula.fml
2. Connect Beckhoff machine, address 192.168.1.100, port 701
3. Enable X-axis
4. Enable Y-axis
5. Enable Z-axis
6. Set X-axis speed to 10

9. Move X-axis to 30

task: Home all axes of Simu machine, then move back to original position
Ini_1:
1. Disconnect Beckhoff machine
2. Connect Simu machine, address 192.168.1.100, port 851
3. Enable X-axis
4. Enable Y-axis
5. Enable Z-axis
6. Set X-axis speed to 10
7. Set Y-axis speed to 10
8. Set Z-axis speed to 10
9. Home X-axis
10. Home Y-axis
11. Home Z-axis
12. Move X-axis to 409
13. Move Y-axis to 13
14. Move Z-axis to 5
Ini_2:
1. Connect Simu machine, address 192.168.1.100, port 701
2. Enable X-axis
3. Enable Y-axis
4. Enable Z-axis
5. Set X-axis speed to 10
6. Set Y-axis speed to 10
7. Set Z-axis speed to 10
8. Home X-axis
9. Home Y-axis
10. Home Z-axis
11. Move X-axis to 0
12. Move Y-axis to 0
13. Move Z-axis to 0
Ini_3:
1. Set X-axis speed to 10
2. Set Y-axis speed to 10
3. Set Z-axis speed to 10
4. Home X-axis
5. Home Y-axis
6. Home Z-axis
7. Move X-axis to 99
8. Move Y-axis to 10
9. Move Z-axis to 0
Ini_4:
1. Connect Simu machine, address 192.168.1.100, port 851
2. Enable X-axis
3. Enable Y-axis
4. Enable Z-axis
5. Set X-axis speed to 10
6. Set Y-axis speed to 10
7. Set Z-axis speed to 10
8. Home X-axis
9. Home Y-axis
10. Home Z-axis
11. Move X-axis to 0
12. Move Y-axis to 0
13. Move Z-axis to 0

task: Beckhoff BTC and ATW are both 200, origin offsets for three axes are 10, -5, 2 respectively. Move all axes to 50, speed 100

4. Set Y-axis origin offset to -5
5. Set Z-axis origin offset to 2
6. Set X-axis speed to 100
7. Enable Y-axis
8. Move X-axis to 50
9. Move Y-axis to 50
10. Move Z-axis to 50

15. Move Z-axis to 50

task: Set RTC6 scanner offset X to 100 degrees, Y to 90 degrees
Ini_1:
1. Set scanner offset X to 100 degrees
2. Set scanner offset Y to 90 degrees
Ini_2:
1. Disconnect Simu scanner
2. Connect RTC6 scanner, control mode 4
3. Set scanner offset X to 100 degrees
4. Set scanner offset Y to 90 degrees
Ini_3: 1. Connect RTC6 scanner, control mode 6\n2. Set scanner offset X to 100 degrees\n3. Set scanner offset Y to 90 degrees
Ini_4: 1. Connect RTC6 scanner, control mode 4\n2. Set scanner offset X to 100 degrees\n3. Set scanner offset Y to 90 degrees

task: Switch to Simu scanner, control mode set to 4, correction file is correction.ct5, jump speed and marking speed are both 30cm/s
Ini_1:
1. Disconnect RTC6 scanner
2. Select scanner correction file correction.ct5
3. Connect Simu scanner, control mode 4
4. Set scanner parameter jump-speed to 30cm/s
5. Set scanner parameter marking-speed to 30cm/s
Ini_2:
1. Disconnect Simu scanner
2. Select scanner correction file correction.ct5
3. Connect Simu scanner, control mode 4
4. Set scanner parameter jump-speed to 30cm/s
5. Set scanner parameter marking-speed to 30cm/s
Ini_3:
1. Select scanner correction file correction.ct5
2. Connect Simu scanner, control mode 4
3. Set scanner parameter jump-speed to 30cm/s
4. Set scanner parameter marking-speed to 30cm/s
Ini_4:
1. Select scanner correction file correction.ct5
2. Connect Simu scanner, control mode 4
3. Set scanner parameter jump-speed to 30cm/s
4. Set scanner parameter marking-speed to 30cm/s

task: Switch to Hikvision camera, calibration file set to cameraCorrection.ct5
Ini_1:
1. Select camera calibration file cameraCorrection.ct5
2. Select Hikvision camera
Ini_2:
1. Select camera calibration file cameraCorrection.ct5
2. Select Hikvision camera
Ini_3: 1. Select camera calibration file cameraCorrection.ct5\n2. Select Hikvision camera
Ini_4: 1. Select camera calibration file cameraCorrection.ct5\n2. Select Hikvision camera

task: Set laser power to 50%, pulse width to 0.3 microseconds, turn on red light and enable
Ini_1: 1. Set laser parameter pulse-width to 0.3μs
Ini_2:
1. Set laser parameter pulse-width to 0.3μs
2. Turn on laser enable
Ini_3: 1. Set laser parameter power to 50%\n2. Set laser parameter pulse-width to 0.3μs\n3. Turn on laser red light
Ini_4: 1. Set laser parameter power to 50%\n2. Set laser parameter pulse-width to 0.3μs\n3. Turn on laser red light

task: Connect IPG laser, serial port COM5, turn on enable after connection, direct emission
Ini_1:
1. Disconnect IPG laser
2. Connect IPG laser, serial port COM5
3. Turn on laser enable
4. Turn on laser laser
Ini_2:
1. Turn on laser enable
2. Turn on laser laser
Ini_3:
1. Disconnect Simu laser
2. Connect IPG laser, serial port COM5
3. Turn on laser enable
4. Turn on laser laser
Ini_4:
1. Disconnect Simu laser
2. Connect IPG laser, serial port COM5
3. Turn on laser enable
4. Turn on laser laser

task: Set Simu laser frequency to 100kHz, turn on indicator light then emit laser directly
Ini_1:
1. Disconnect IPG laser
2. Connect Simu laser, address 192.168.1.1, port 851
3. Set laser parameter frequency to 100khz
4. Turn on laser indicator light
5. Turn on laser enable
6. Turn on laser laser

1. Disconnect IPG laser
2. Connect Simu laser, serial port COM5
3. Set laser parameter frequency to 100khz
4. Turn on laser indicator light
5. Turn on laser enable
6. Turn on laser laser
Ini_3: 1. Set laser parameter frequency to 100khz\n2. Turn on laser laser
Ini_4: 1. Set laser parameter frequency to 100khz\n2. Turn on laser indicator light\n3. Turn on laser laser

task: Do not scan contour, select by cell mode for marking mode, set processing count to 2, start processing
Ini_1:
1. Set processing parameter contour-scanning to no scanning contour
2. Set processing parameter marking-mode to by cell
3. Set processing parameter cycle-count to 2
4. Enable Y-axis
5. Start processing
Ini_2:
1. Connect Simu machine, address 192.168.1.100, port 701
2. Enable X-axis
3. Enable Y-axis
4. Enable Z-axis
5. Set X-axis speed to 10
6. Set Y-axis speed to 10
7. Set Z-axis speed to 10
8. Turn on laser enable
9. Enable tool retraction
10. Set processing parameter contour-scanning to no scanning contour
11. Set processing parameter marking-mode to by cell
12. Set processing parameter cycle-count to 2
13. Start processing
Ini_3:
1. Connect RTC6 scanner, control mode 6
2. Set processing parameter contour-scanning to no scanning contour
3. Set processing parameter marking-mode to by cell
4. Set processing parameter cycle-count to 2
5. Set Z-axis speed to 10
6. Start processing
Ini_4:
1. Connect Beckhoff machine, address 192.168.1.50, port 851
2. Enable X-axis
3. Enable Y-axis
4. Enable Z-axis
5. Set X-axis speed to 10
6. Set Y-axis speed to 10
7. Set Z-axis speed to 10
8. Connect RTC6 scanner, control mode 4
9. Enable tool retraction
10. Set processing parameter contour-scanning to no scanning contour
11. Set processing parameter marking-mode to by cell
12. Set processing parameter cycle-count to 2
13. Start processing

9. Set scanner offset X to 90
10. Set scanner offset Y to 0
11. Set scanner offset Z to 0
12. Set scanner offset α to 0
13. Set scanner offset β to 180
14. Set scanner offset γ to 0
15. Enable tool retraction
16. Start processing
